## R Communities on the Local Level?  {data-background=Hintergrund_CorrelAid.png}

**Decentralization**: NPOs often operate on the Local Level

**Inclusion**: Data Scientists and RUsers do not all want to move to the capital city

**Diversity**: Local structures allow for better matches between Data Scientists and NPOs

**Supply and Demand**: Some offers/formats might work better in certain locations than in others

## Wrap-Up {data-background=Hintergrund_CorrelAid.png}

- R Communities on the Local Level serve several purposes:

  - Inclusion and community building among RUsers
  - Serving Data4Good on the Local Level
  - Increasing visibility and acknowledgment of Data4Good among broader parts of society
  
If you want to join a CorrelAidX-Chapter or even set up your own Chapter, please contact [CorrelAid](mailto:info@correlaid.org)
